humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that the largest invasive carcinoma measures 2.8 cm in greatest dimension, which falls within the range for a T2 tumor (more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm). Therefore, the pathologic T stage of the patient's cancer is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The T stage for staging breast cancer is based on the size of the primary tumor. In this report, the largest focus of invasion measures 2.8 cm in greatest dimension. Therefore, the T stage for this patient is T2.
